comments.html: I particularly enjoy seeing what happens when applications that are designed to be intra-datacenter adjacent but are split for DR purposes start to experience latency, jitter, and loss.  A WAN emulator is a fun tool to have when testing things like this.
comments.name: Avery Abbott

comments.html: I'm a big fan of testing new deployments (whenever possible) where everybody relies on those stretched VLANs over hundreds of miles. Power off all the switches on one site and enjoy the party :D So 100 percent agreeing: only testing in real life will give you certainty. All those assumptions are worthless. There are too many dependencies which no one could even imagine.
comments.name: Anonymous
